After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance. Get back on your feet, and claim your revenge in this stealth action-adventure game

Unveil your wish and fulfill it



Approach situations in multiple ways using the tools at your reach






Go wherever you want whenever you want






Brothers in Hell came to me in a dream and it’s now a reality and I hope that you can feel the dedication, creativity and passion embedded in every aspect of the game
